news_header: The Industry Union rejected a wage increase proposal, leading to planned strikes. Negotiations have been ongoing for five months without resolution.
news_original_title: Teknologiateollisuuden työriitaan ei saatu sopua – Teollisuusliiton lakot alkavat maanantaina
news_text: The Industry Union has deemed the proposed wage increases insufficient, resulting in planned strikes starting Monday. The employer side had accepted a proposal for a three-year contract with a total wage increase of 7%, but the union found this inadequate. The negotiations have been ongoing for five months, with no agreement reached despite multiple attempts. The situation is complicated by a new law affecting wage negotiations in export sectors, which has drawn criticism from unions in female-dominated industries. Mediation will continue on Wednesday.
